term.title: optically labile

item.text: A term describing a system in which stereoisomerization results in a change of optical rotation with time. (Usage strongly discouraged).

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2193. 'Basic terminology of stereochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2212 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122193)
